storyTitle: Integrate Fix Command Trigger from Issue Workflow
actions: Extended issue-event-listener workflow to trigger repository_dispatch events
Created fix-trigger workflow to handle async fix attempts
Implemented fix-queued labeling system
Added automated comment with fix context to issues
Created comprehensive testing documentation
notes: Asynchronous fix trigger using repository_dispatch ensures non-blocking issue creation. Fix workflow posts context and instructions for manual /fix execution.

storyTitle: Add Retry Detection to Bug Logger
actions: Enhanced bug logger with two-stage retry detection
Added closed issue search to identify retries
Implemented attempt count tracking
Created three new workflow outputs for downstream integration
Enhanced structured logging and GitHub Actions summary
notes: Retry detection uses label-based matching for closed issues with resolution attempts. Outputs enable Story #11 integration.

storyTitle: Integrate Bug Resolver Call from Bug Logger
actions: Added job outputs to expose retry detection state
Created call-bug-resolver job with conditional execution
Integrated bug-resolver workflow call when retry detected
Enhanced workflow summary to mention bug resolver integration
Updated documentation with retry detection flow
notes: Final integration connects bug logger with bug resolver - automatically updates previous issues when retries are detected
